name: Scroll Stop Google Maps
author: JQ Rambo

sections.description: Have you ever found yourself scrolling past a Google Map but rather end up zooming in/out on the map instead? Well, this plugin will prevent that. Google Maps Scroll Stop will allow users to scroll past Google Maps and will show a transparent overlay that can be clicked to allow map zooming again. Pretty simple!
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/plugin-name directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the \’Plugins\’ screen in WordPress
  3. That’s it!
sections.faq:
There’s none yet!

Installation Instructions

  1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/plugin-name directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the \’Plugins\’ screen in WordPress
  3. That’s it!

short_description: This plugin simply stops any Google map iframe from zooming in/out as the user scrolls past it on a page. It places an overlay over the iframe that th …
